original_title: Trump wants DC to charge 14-year-olds as adults. Here’s where the district’s laws stand | CNN Politics
article_summary: "President Trump and US Attorney Jeanine Pirro call for stricter juvenile crime laws in Washington DC, citing high rates of juvenile arrests and violent crimes. They propose prosecuting 14-year-olds as adults for serious offenses and changing or overturning three DC laws to achieve this."</s>
